meaningMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an い on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>slow</kanji>? It's <vocabulary>slow</vocabulary> (or, if you're slow, you're probably <vocabulary>late</vocabulary>, too).
readingMnemonic: How <vocabulary>slow</vocabulary> are you? You are <reading>oh so</reading> slow (おそ).
